author: ghost
body:
<!--

For Windows PowerShell 5.1 issues, suggestions, or feature requests please use the following link instead:
Windows PowerShell [UserVoice](https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell)

This repository is **ONLY** for PowerShell Core 6 and PowerShell 7+ issues.

- Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/known-issues-ps6).

-->

## Steps to reproduce

Follow instructions at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-ca/powershell/scripting/install/installing-powershell-core-on-linux?view=powershell-7#ubuntu-1804.

## Expected behavior

Successful installation

## Actual behavior

```bash
The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 powershell : Depends: libicu55 but it is not installable
```

## Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->
Fresh installation of Ubuntu 18.04.3 (LTS) x64 on DigitalOcean droplet

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @octos4murai Please share PowerShell versions as requested in the issue template.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
It is .Net dependency https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/Documentation/linux-prereqs.md
GitHub
dotnet/core
Home repository for .NET Core. Contribute to dotnet/core development by creating an account on GitHub.

comments.author: ghost
comments.body: @iSazonov It's my mistake--I was attempting to install the version for Ubuntu 16.04 rather than 18.04.

title: Install fails on Ubuntu 18.04
